name: Spaceball 2000
overview: This was originally to be a subgame in a giant, epic space-adventure that the author, SawnBringer worked on for 4 years but never completed, so this was released in a standalone fashion It is a Tennis/Arkanoid/SpeedBall cross, coded in AMOS. You play the tournament for 4 rounds and the opponents get harder each game, with the final tennis boss being very difficult.
